name: Tips for Growing Facial Hair
short_description: Shaving is a rite of passage for young men all across the nation. As those first few strands of peach fuzz sprout to the surface, you take to your safety razor to promote a clean, professional look. However, more and more men are ignoring the razor and letting their facial hair grow free. The beard is as popular as ever, but some have more trouble than others when it comes to actually growing their facial hair. Here are some tips for growing a beard or mustache that you can be proud of.
